issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement Find_In_Set Function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15644](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15644). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns the first occurrence of str in strList where strList is a comma-delimited string. Returns null if either argument is null. Returns 0 if the first argument contains any commas.
